name: files.comments.delete
desc: Delete an existing comment on a file. Only the original author of the comment or a team administrator may delete a file comment.

file.desc: File to delete a comment from.

errors.file_not_found: The requested file could not be found.
errors.file_deleted: The requested file was previously deleted.
errors.cant_delete: The requested comment could not be deleted.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
